post.subject: Light Cone Event Warp: Brilliant Fixation & Coalesced Truths
post.content:
Hello, Trailblazers!

Light Cone Event Warp Period for this phase is after the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time), and includes the following content:


▌"Brilliant Fixation: I Venture Forth to Hunt" Light Cone Event Warp

●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "I Venture Forth to Hunt (The Hunt)" and the 4-star Light Cones "Swordplay (The Hunt)," "Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)," "The Birth of the Self (Erudition)" will be boosted for a limited time.


■Event Period

After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)


■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cone

I Venture Forth to Hunt (The Hunt)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones

Swordplay (The Hunt)


Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)

The Birth of the Self (Erudition)


▌"Coalesced Truths: Patience Is All You Need" Light Cone Event Warp

●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Patience Is All You Need (Nihility)" and the 4-star Light Cones "Swordplay (The Hunt)," "Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)," "The Birth of the Self (Erudition)" will be boosted for a limited time.


■Event Period

After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)


■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cone

Patience Is All You Need (Nihility)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones

Swordplay (The Hunt)


Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)

The Birth of the Self (Erudition)


▌"Coalesced Truths: Reforged Remembrance" Light Cone Event Warp

●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Reforged Remembrance (Nihility)" and the 4-star Light Cones "Swordplay (The Hunt)," "Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)," "The Birth of the Self (Erudition)" will be boosted for a limited time.


■Event Period

After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)


■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cone

Reforged Remembrance (Nihility)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones

Swordplay (The Hunt)


Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)

The Birth of the Self (Erudition)


▌"Coalesced Truths: Flowing Nightglow" Light Cone Event Warp

●During the event, the drop rates of the limited 5-star Light Cone "Flowing Nightglow (Harmony)" and the 4-star Light Cones "Swordplay (The Hunt)," "Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)," "The Birth of the Self (Erudition)" will be boosted for a limited time.


■Event Period

After the Version 2.5 update – 2024/10/02 11:59:00 (server time)


■Drop Rate Boost: 5-Star Light Cone

Flowing Nightglow (Harmony)

■Drop Rate Boost: 4-Star Light Cones

Swordplay (The Hunt)


Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat (Nihility)

The Birth of the Self (Erudition)

※ Among the above Light Cones, the limited Light Cone will not become available in the Stellar Warp event.

※ During the event, the limited 5-star Light Cone "I Venture Forth to Hunt" (The Hunt) can only be obtained from "Brilliant Fixation: I Venture Forth to Hunt" Light Cone Event Warp.

※ During the event, the limited 5-star Light Cones "Patience Is All You Need (Nihility)," "Reforged Remembrance (Nihility)," and "Flowing Nightglow (Harmony)" can only be obtained from the corresponding "Brilliant Fixation: Coalesced Truths" Light Cone Event Warp.

※ This event is considered a Light Cone Event Warp. The cumulative Warp count for a guaranteed 5-star Light Cone in any Light Cone Event Warp will always be carried over to other Light Cone Event Warps, but is independent of and unaffected by other types of Warps.
